roleset.name: wage war

example.name: the tail that wages the dog?
example.text: In 1986, Baker, Nye waged a proxy fight for control of Leaseway Transportation Inc. that ultimately led to Leaseway's being sold.
example.arg: a proxy fight for control of Leaseway Transportation Inc. that ultimately led to Leaseway's being sold.

example.name: with foe
example.text: His Republican counterpart, Sen. Warren Rudman (R., N.H.), has used his position [*]to wage a legislative war with the conservative board of the Legal Services Corp.
example.arg: His Republican counterpart, Sen. Warren Rudman (R., N.H.),
with the conservative board of the Legal Services Corp.

roleset.note: WAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wage' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from wage.01-v predicate notes)
